spas
Interface ISpas

All Known Implementing Classes:
Spas
public interface ISpas

The spatial system. Maintains the local space map and the persistence memory.

Author:
Olivier

Method Detail

setTracer

void setTracer(ITracer tracer)
Parameters:
tracer - The tracer

step

IObservation step(IAct act,
                  IStimulation[] visualCortex,
                  IStimulation[] tactileCortex,
                  IStimulation kinematicStimulation,
                  IStimulation gustatoryStimulation)
Processes the impact of the enacted interaction on the local space system.

Parameters:
act - The enacted act.
visualCortex - The set of visual stimulations in the visual cortex.
tactileCortex - The set of tactile stimulations in the tactile cortex.
kinematicStimulation - The kinematic stimulation.
gustatoryStimulation - The gustatory stimulation.
Returns:
An observation to compute the impact on the imos.

addStimulation

IStimulation addStimulation(int type,
                            int value)
Add a stimulation to static memory if it does not already exist.

Parameters:
type - The stimulation's type.
value - The stimulation's value.
Returns:
the new stimulation if created or the already existing stimulation.

getValue

int getValue(int i,
             int j)
Provide a rgb code to display the local space map in the environment.

Parameters:
i - x coordinate.
j - y coordinate.
Returns:
The value of the bundle in this place in local space memory.

getAttention

int getAttention()
Provide a rgb code to display the the object of Ernest's attention in the environment.

Returns:
The value of the focus bundle.

setSalienceList

void setSalienceList(java.util.List<IPlace> placeList)
Set the place list (from Simon's local space map).

Parameters:
placeList - The list of place in Ernest's local space memory.

update

void update(javax.vecmath.Vector3f translation,
            float rotation)
Update the local space memory according to the agent's moves.

Parameters:
translation - The translation value (provide the opposite value from the agent's movement).
rotation - The rotation value (provide the opposite value from the agent's movement).

getPlaceList

java.util.List<IPlace> getPlaceList()
Returns:
The list of places in Ernest's local space memory.
